name: auto-register-form-filler
description: Browser extension for automatically filling registration forms with random data

scripts.validate: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const manifest = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./manifest.json', 'utf8')); console.log('✓ Manifest valid'); console.log('Name:', manifest.name); console.log('Version:', manifest.version);"
scripts.test-syntax: node -c scripts/content.js && node -c scripts/background.js && node -c popup/popup.js && echo '✓ All JS files have valid syntax'
scripts.check: npm run validate && npm run test-syntax

author: Auto Register Extension Team
